sections.title: Context & Role in Titan DR
sections.goal: Understand E and E2's involvement, responsibilities, and perspectives on the DR drills.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your role during the last Titan DR GameDay exercise?
What are the primary objectives of the multi-region failover from your point of view?
How does the DR runbook RB-DR-001 guide your actions during a drill?

sections.title: Process & Tooling
sections.goal: Explore the operational processes, tools, and automation in place for DR.
sample_questions: Which monitoring or orchestration tools are most critical during a failover?
How do you coordinate between SRE and Architecture teams in real-time?
Can you describe a moment when the runbook needed improvisation?

sections.title: Cross-System Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify multi-hop dependencies and how they affect DR outcomes.
sample_questions: What upstream or downstream systems have the biggest impact on DR success?
How do you handle data consistency across regions during failover?
Can you give an example where an unrelated service caused a DR complication?

sections.title: User Experience During DR
sections.goal: Assess how DR events are perceived by end users and internal stakeholders.
sample_questions: What kind of communication do you maintain with customer-facing teams during a DR event?
How do you measure the user impact according to SLA-HEL-01 or similar agreements?
Have you ever had to prioritize user experience over technical completeness during recovery?

sections.title: Tradeoffs & Risks
sections.goal: Discuss decision-making, tradeoffs, and risk management in DR strategy.
sample_questions: What are the main tradeoffs you face between RTO and cost?
How do you decide on the acceptable BLAST_RADIUS when planning failover?
Can you share evidence from a ticket or RFC that influenced a major DR decision?

sections.title: Improvements & Future Plans
sections.goal: Identify areas for improvement and future enhancements to DR capabilities.
sample_questions: What lessons from TEST-DR-2025-Q1 are you planning to apply?
Are there automation or architecture changes on the roadmap to improve DR?
If you could change one policy or convention to make DR smoother, what would it be?
